attributes.action: Stop Scarborough Borough Council Making Scarborough the Most Inaccesable And Expensive Place to Drive to in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last number of years, Scarborough Borough Council have levied obscene parking charges on locals and visitors to the town. Now they add insult to injury by building a new traffic scheme on two of the main roads into the town that is literally choking it to death.
A journey down one Seamer Road (A main artery into the town) once would take 10 minutes max is now taking 30 - 40 minutes due to the excess of traffic lights that have been installed. The locals have complained bitterly during the construction, and SBC have taken no notice whatsoever - just head down and ploughed on regardsless of local opinion. Mr Brown - please take them to task before they ruin one of the jewels of the North Yorkshire Coast.
